Simpler reproducer:

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"os/exec"
	"time"
)

//var ballast = make([][]byte, 2e8)

func main() {
	go func() {
		prev := time.Now()
		for now := range time.NewTicker(time.Millisecond).C {
			fmt.Println(now.Sub(prev))
			prev = now
		}	
	}()
	for {
		exec.Command("ls").CombinedOutput()
	}
}
